references.paper_title: Mamba: Linear-Time Sequence Modeling with Selective State Spaces
references.reason: This paper introduces the Mamba model, a structured state space model which is the foundation for the SambaMixer model proposed in this paper.

references.paper_title: MambaMixer: Efficient Selective State Space Models with Dual Token and Channel Selection
references.reason: This paper introduces the MambaMixer model, which extends the Mamba model to handle multi-variate time series, a key component of the SambaMixer architecture.

references.paper_title: [Mamba-2] Transformers are SSMs: Generalized Models and Efficient Algorithms Through Structured State Space Duality
references.reason: This paper provides further theoretical understanding and improvements to the structured state space models which underpins the SambaMixer's design.

references.paper_title: Lithium-ion battery state of health estimation using a hybrid model based on a convolutional neural network and bidirectional gated recurrent unit
references.reason: This paper is a state-of-the-art model for Li-ion battery SOH prediction that the authors' model is compared against.
This dataset is the primary source of experimental data used to train and evaluate the proposed model and other models used for comparison.
